department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Building Thought: Sculpture Course
course.description: Using a variety of materials and methods, students will build and create artworks that reflect their ideas, with an emphasis and understanding of the language of images, materials, forms, actions, and presentation. Through images, videos, and informal discussions, students will be introduced to the concerns of conceptual artists of the 20th Century to the present.
